comments_since_last_sample.body: The climate change documentary especially those made by big brand influencer should start portraying climate change impact on middle class and modern lives in developed nations also, instead of just typically highlight the plights of the poor and the third-worlds …. Unceasing burning of l fossil fuel and addiction of plastics and whatnot that affect the weather, oceans and forests are not the problems of the poor nations or the third-words alone.

They tell you global warming 
I tell you God's wrath 
Elites know it so they try to explain it "scientifically"but oh they know and they're getting ready in rush.Its at the doorstep...

3 degrees doesn’t seem like much to Americans because for better (or more probably, worse) we still measure temperature in Fahrenheit. To get Americans to start paying attention to global warming, journalists should start expressing warming in terms of Fahrenheit, where 3 degrees translates to almost 6 degrees of change. Whoa, now we might pay attention.

What they say is absolutely true. Lemme give my example..i live in West Bengal, India,  parts of which are  very low-lying. When i was born, our home never used to get flooded even in heavy rain... A few years ago, it started getting flooded with about an hour of rain... And this year our home was flooded on about 30 days with just about 20 mins of heavy rainfall
